CustomField.description: If this is checked, all contacts for this account will be suspended when one contact at the same company or phone is suspended with a DevOutcome of: Not a Fit,Client Request,Research Needed,Research Dead End,Out Of Business,Current Client, or Competitor
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this is checked, all contacts for this account will be suspended when one contact at the same company or phone is suspended with a DevOutcome of: Not a Fit,Client Request,Research Needed,Research Dead End,Out Of Business,Current Client, or Competitor
CustomField.label: Suspend When Another Contact Suspended
